Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 10 Mahantaraduka » 10.2 Cittaduka » 10.2.3 Paccayavāra » 10.2.3.2 Paccayapaccanīya » 10.2.3.2.2 Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
Mahantaraduka
Cittaduka
Paccayavāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
66.
2471Nahetuyā pañca, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā pañca, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte pañca, napacchājāte pañca, naāsevane pañca, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke pañca, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne pañca, namagge pañca, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte pañca, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
<< 10.2.3.2.2 Saṅkhyāvāraup10.2.3.3 Paccayānulomapaccanīya >>
